file.name: motu.yaml
file.content: openapi: "3.0.0" info: title: Masters of the Universe version: "1.0" description: | # Don't forget - Put all details on each property - Components, $ref and allOf - Tags - Meaningful and rich descriptions - Examples # Tools ## OpenAPI Specification documentation: - ðŸ”— OpenAPI Map: (https://openapi-map.apihandyman.io/) - ðŸ”— OpenAPI Spec Github repo: (https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification) ## Tools (I use): - ðŸ”— OpenAPI (42 Crunch) VS Code Extension (https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=42Crunch.vscode-openapi) - ðŸ”— Stoplight Studio GUI (https://stoplight.io/studio/) - ðŸ”— Stoplight Spectral linter (https://github.com/stoplightio/spectral) - ðŸ”— Stoplight Prism Mock generator (https://github.com/stoplightio/prism/) - ðŸ”— Redoc CLI (https://github.com/Redocly/redoc/blob/master/cli/README.md) - ðŸ”— Swagger Editor (https://editor.swagger.io/) # API Doc Everything about the Masters of the Universe characters and toys A longer multi-lines description! With _markdown_ # Section ## Sub section # Images Regular image ![](https://placekitten.com/640/360) Embedded base64 image tags: - name: Toys description: All about Masters of the Universe Franchise Toys - name: Characters description: All about Masters of the Universe Franchise Characters paths: /characters: get: tags: - Characters summary: Search characters responses: "200": description: OK content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CharactersPaginated' '401': $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized' post: tags: - Characters summary: Add a character description: This is where you provide information about what the operation does or how to works if actually needed requestBody: $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/Character' responses: '201': description: Created content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Character' /characters/{characterId}: parameters: - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CharacterId' get: tags: - Characters summary: Read a character responses: "200": description: OK content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Character' examples: Hero: $ref: '#/components/examples/Hero' Villain: $ref: '#/components/examples/Villain' '401': $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized' delete: tags: - Characters summary: Delete a character responses: '204': description: Character has been deleted '401': $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized' put: tags: - Characters summary: Replace a character requestBody: $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/Character' responses: '204': description: No Content /characters/{characterId}/toys: parameters: - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CharacterId' post: tags: - Toys summary: Add character's toy responses: '201': description: Toy added /toys: get: tags: - Toys summary: Search toys responses: '200': description: Found toys components: examples: Hero: summary: A hero sample value: id: qssdqsd name: He-Man side: hero archEnemyId: azeae Villain: summary: A villain sample value: id: azeae name: Skeletor side: villain archEnemyId: qssdqsd requestBodies: Character: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Character' responses: Unauthorized: description: Unauthorized content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Errors' parameters: CharacterId: name: characterId in: path required: true schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CharacterId' schemas: CharactersPaginated: allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Paginated' - properties: items: type: array maxItems: 3 items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CharacterSummary' Paginated: properties: pagination: required: - page - pageSize properties: page: type: integer minimum: 0 pageSize: type: integer minimum: 0 maximum: 50 Errors: required: - errors properties: errors: type: array minItems: 1 items: type: object required: - code - message properties: code: type: string message: type: string location: type: string description: JSON path to the source of the error CharacterId: type: string pattern: ^[a-z]{3,}$ readOnly: true CharacterSummary: type: object required: - id - name properties: id: # description + $ref works only in 3.1 description: The character unique id $ref: '#/components/schemas/CharacterId' name: type: string minLength: 3 maxLength: 36 example: Skeletor sideKickId: # How to add a description to a $ref before 3.1 allOf: - description: The character unique id - $ref: '#/components/schemas/CharacterId' Character: allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/CharacterSummary' - type: object properties: birthDate: type: string format: date writeOnly: true age: type: integer minimum: 0 maximum: 128 readOnly: true side: type: string enum: - hero - villain - neutral archEnemyId: type: string

Error: buildIR: make ir: path "/characters": get: responses: code 200: contents: application/json: generate schema: allOf: field items: item: field sideKickId: allOf: schema type mismatch:  and string
